The devs are still very on the ball about maintaining this game and keeping it fresh even after 5 years. The player base are still aplenty and everyone are very involved when in game. However, DC-ing is still a problem. No penalty allows these players to throw the game away anytime they please. Usually on the first time being downed or first hook. Spoiling the game for everyone. But in general, this game is well worth the money spent.

Its good/alright, Its a game where you need hours and need time to play to get good, The game itself isn't terrible, the community is just either toxic or wholesome, mostly toxic though, Its a fun game but after awhile you kinda get bored, stop playing it.. then after awhile you play it again, find it fun, then repeat, unless you have friends to play with, in this case, i don't have friends, Its very boring to play solo, the game seems to get more broken each chapter is put out, the past 3-4 chapters have been eh, not very interesting, the last good chapter i say was the strangers things one. its a good game, but with a terrible community. <3 if you like games that take awhile to get use to, have friends to play with, and a positive person, I would buy this game, and before you make this mistake like I did, don't buy the cosmetics, unless you know, your going to play this game for a long amount of time, and you know that you have a decent income of money, don't waste your money for your survivor/killer to look "cool" unless you play the game alot.

Из минусов наверное - очень токсичное игровое сообщество. Чтобы начать играть достойно придется отыграть 1000 часов точно, пока поймешь все фишки  и ньюансы, а потом ещё 1000, чтобы всё это научится делать. В общем рекомендую!

Don't play survivor if you don't have friends, and don't play killer if you're in a good mood.
Good game, alot of fun.

At the outset, I would like to say that I have played this game with 4 people, so I will not say about the solo survivor's  perspective.
SURVIVOR POV
With four people game  is very fun to play until you encounter face camper or tunneler . Fixing generators, running away from the killer and looping him once you learn it,  it is very satisfying. 
There is an element of horror in the game when you hear your heartbeat, but you still want to finish the generator and suddenly a killer appears behind you and the chase begins.
KILLER POV
Most matches are pleasant but often game makes more difficult, choosing the right strategy, choosing whether it is better to chase someone or defend the generators, mind games at loops.
Unfortunately, the rank system is broken because if your team has one guy with rank 20 and two with 3 rank, you will meet them when you have 13 killer rank.
teabaggers and toxic players can easily put you off playing killer.
PS4 players may teleport or lag sometimes, this is normal.

To sum up,
when you are looking for a game to play with your friends, I highly recommend it.

某菜狗给萌新玩家的建议：1.心态最重要，快乐是第一，屠夫不上头，转点不丢人。人类重意识，秒倒不抱怨。赛前人类跑，赛后屠夫跑。每周圣所注意有没有适合的传承技能，萌新人类多练贴膜和转视角，带上机遇之窗，多练习加深印象，疲劳值技能首推钢筋铁骨，其次翻窗加速平稳着陆，自摸和猫都好使，同族技能相当于屠夫bbq，萌新屠夫试试夹哥或者小叮当，技能首推人肉烧烤和厄咒：毁灭和心惊肉跳，厄咒：不死，一刀杀看情况 2.加速器首推奇妙加速器（白嫖），追求稳定可以试试雷神 3.平时看视频，人类看付导和离枯，屠夫看树海和193，图一乐或者想看节目效果看印度卤蛋解说拒绝 4.日服大佐喜欢蹲蘑菇，躲猫猫，韩服玉米喜欢嘲讽和无能狂怒，单排建议韩服，玩屠夫建议日服，喜欢守尸没问题，做好赛后被骂或者GGEZ的准备就行 5.ZZZ确实存在问题，但玩得开心更重要，少点戾气 6.以上意见比较片面，仁者见仁智者见智。
